plot: In the game of love... there are no rules. Just a girl, willing to go to any length to find "The One."
plot_en: In the game of love... there are no rules. Just a girl, willing to go to any length to find "The One."
plot_es: In the game of love... there are no rules. Just a girl, willing to go to any length to find "The One."
title: Love On-The-Line
